analyzerTester.simulationWarning: * This is a simulation and may differ from actual Elasticsearch analysis results.
analyzerTester.standardDescription: Standard Analyzer: Splits text into words and converts to lowercase.
analyzerTester.simpleDescription: Simple Analyzer: Converts non-characters to spaces and converts to lowercase.
analyzerTester.whitespaceDescription: Whitespace Analyzer: Splits text by whitespace.
analyzerTester.keywordDescription: Keyword Analyzer: Treats the input text as a single token.
analyzerTester.patternDescription: Pattern Analyzer: Tokenizes text using a regular expression pattern.
analyzerTester.uax_url_emailDescription: URL and Email Analyzer: Preserves URLs and emails while tokenizing text.
